testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.My_Preferences_Register_CustomStamp
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session for user is already active. Do you want to create a new session? Dialog box displayed. User clicks OK button. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. User has logged in successfully.

Test Scenario 1: Verifying Register Custom Stamp UI and Upload Stamp Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Register Custom Stamp tooltip text Verified Click on the Register Custom Stamp Button The Contentverse this Dialog title should display The Stamp Name: this text should display Register Custom Stamp title and text Verified Register Custom Stamp dialog closed Verified Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Click on the Register Custom Stamp Button Register Custom Stamp dialog cancel Verified Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Click on the Register Custom Stamp Button Click on the Register Custom Stamp dialog Add Button Please input Stamp Name and retry the operation. this toast message should show Enter Register Custom Stamp Name Click on the Register Custom Stamp dialog Add Button Please select the stamp file. this toast message should show By using AutoIT add file from external folder Click on the Register Custom Stamp dialog Add Button Click on the Register Custom Stamp dialog cancel button Stamp Uploaded Successfully.. this toast message should show Register Custom Stamp added succeesfully

Test Scenario 2: Add Register Custom Stamp in Lead View Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Select Office document and set as Default view Select Pdf document and set as Default view Click on Apply button Saved Successfully! this toast message should show Click on New Document Tab Click on Destination Folder Textbox Expand a Cabinet Expand a Drawer select a Folder Click on Ok button Select Document type dropdown Enter value Report Name field Browse Document Page By using AutoIT add file from external folder Click on Create button Click on Navigate button Select and Open Document Browse Document Page By using AutoIT add file from external folder PDF Page open successfully Click on Save button menu Option Click on Ok button Verified and Create PDF and tif file with adding Custom Stamp in Lead view Close the document page

Test Scenario 3: Reset Register Custom Stamp from Admin Preferences Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear. Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: admin Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Click on Setting Icon Click on Admin preferences Added Custom Stamp Select from dropdown Selected Stamp Deleted ! this toast message should show Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear.
